content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 50, "index": 15}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 59, "index": 30}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 61, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_bricks, I need to craft 4 polished_blackstone first. To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move 1 blackstone from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 50, "index": 15}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 59, "index": 30}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 61, "index": 45}]
thought: I now need to move a blackstone to the right of the blackstone in slot 1. Therefore I will move 1 blackstone from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
